message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is the definition of depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see there is a line item explicitly labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 117540.62 on 2024-02-03.

Depreciation is exactly what the task is asking for - it represents the systematic allocation of the cost of tangible assets over their useful lives.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '117540.62'} }
```
